name: Road Racer (Rafabot Games)
description:
Race through the traffic,avoid another vehicles and show how long you can go.
Rules:
>Challenge the traffic and race for the long distance(on Miles) you can.
>Avoid the Federal Vehicles. They can drive  on your way.
>Refuel frequently with fuel tank on road. If your fuel end,you lost.
>Moderate using the brakes or they can get ruined and blow your tires.
>Try beating the last player with Best distance.

Controls:
Use arrow keys to control the car.
>↑= Accelerate
>↓= Brake
>←= Steer Left
>→= Steer Right
